mapper.insert: insert into db_repeatproduct (SEQUENCEID, SALSEMONEY, PUBLISNUM, CHANGERATE, PRICEAVG, OFFER, TOPSALSENUM, TOPSALSEMONEY, OPENFLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, CORPID, TITLE) values (#{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{salsemoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{publisnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{changerate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priceavg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{offer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{topsalsenum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{topsalsemoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{openflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{corpid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{title,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_repeatproduct set SALSEMONEY = #{salsemoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PUBLISNUM = #{publisnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHANGERATE = #{changerate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRICEAVG = #{priceavg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OFFER = #{offer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOPSALSENUM = #{topsalsenum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TOPSALSEMONEY = #{topsalsemoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, SALSEMONEY, PUBLISNUM, CHANGERATE, PRICEAVG, OFFER, TOPSALSENUM, TOPSALSEMONEY, OPENFLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, CORPID, TITLE from db_repeatproduct where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select SEQUENCEID, SALSEMONEY, PUBLISNUM, CHANGERATE, PRICEAVG, OFFER, TOPSALSENUM, TOPSALSEMONEY, OPENFLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, CORPID, TITLE from db_repeatproduct
